summary: The implementation successfully delivers all core requirements with a well-structured full-stack application. The frontend provides speaking practice UI, teacher dashboard, and engaging visual design. The backend stores sessions with prompts, tracks completion status, and manages user roles. All requirements are implemented with appropriate separation of concerns.

hallucinated_features.description: Role-based access control system with admin/user permissions and authentication
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly excludes third-party authentication integrations in non-goals. The implementation includes Internet Identity authentication, authorization mixins, and role-based permission checks throughout the codebase.

hallucinated_features.description: Recording URL storage and submission workflow with review status tracking
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly state 'Real-time voice recording or speech recognition' is not included. The implementation includes recordingUrl fields, submission flows, and multiple session statuses (submittedForReview, reviewed) that imply audio recording functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin prompt management interface with CRUD operations
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 specifies creating a library of prompts but does not explicitly require an admin interface for creating/managing prompts. The implementation includes a full AdminPromptManagement page with form controls for creating new prompts.
